word:
Before us, on the other side of the chasm, was a beautiful field of green grass, about six inches high. I could not see the sun, but bright, soft beams of light, resembling fine gold and silver, were resting upon this field. Nothing I had seen upon earth could compare in beauty and glory with this field. But could we 
                                                                           193
succeed in reaching it? was the anxious inquiry. Should the cord break, we must perish.
